prompt:
Analyze these 3 Polymarket markets.

For EACH market:
1. Estimate the TRUE PROBABILITY based on news context
2. Calculate EDGE vs market price
3. Only recommend trades with 10%+ edge


Market 1:
Title: Will Fernando Mendoza win the Heisman Trophy?
Current Market Price: 98.0% (this is the market's implied probability)
Recent trade: $13,205.35 on Yes
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/heisman-trophy-winner

📰 WEB SEARCH CONTEXT:
As of December 13, 2025, Fernando Mendoza, quarterback for Indiana University, is a leading contender for the Heisman Trophy. He has been named a finalist alongside Notre Dame running back Jeremiyah Love, Ohio State quarterback Julian Sayin, and Vanderbilt quarterback Diego Pavia. ([heisman.com](https://www.heisman.com/articles/love-mendoza-pavia-sayin-named-2025-heisman-trophy-finalists/?utm_source=openai))

Mendoza has had an exceptional season, leading Indiana to a perfect 13-0 record and a Big Ten Championship. He has thrown for 2,980 yards, leading the nation with 33 passing touchdowns, and added 240 rushing yards with six rushing touchdowns. ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/sports/qbs-fernando-mendoza-diego-pavia-julian-sayin-among-heisman-finalists--flm-2025-12-09/?utm_source=openai))

His performance has garnered significant recognition, including being named the Associated Press Player of the Year. Mendoza is also the favorite in betting markets to win the Heisman Trophy

---

Market 2:
Title: Arsenal FC vs. Wolverhampton Wanderers FC: O/U 2.5
Current Market Price: 65.0% (this is the market's implied probability)
Recent trade: $943.15 on Over
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/epl-ars-wol-2025-12-13-more-markets

📰 WEB SEARCH CONTEXT:
Arsenal FC is set to host Wolverhampton Wanderers FC at Emirates Stadium on Saturday, December 13, 2025, at 12:00 PM PST. 

**Recent Form and Team News:**

- **Arsenal FC:** The Gunners lead the Premier League with 33 points from 15 matches, boasting 10 wins, 3 draws, and 2 losses. Their goal difference of +19 reflects a strong offensive and defensive record, having scored 28 goals and conceded 9. In their last six matches, Arsenal secured 3 wins and 2 draws, with only one loss. At home, they have been particularly dominant, winning their last three Premier League games with an average of 3 goals scored per match. ([forebet.com](https://www.forebet.com/en/football-match-previews/24470-arsenal-set-for-statement-performance-against-struggling-wolverhampton?utm_source=openai))

- **Wolverhampton Wanderers FC:** Wolves are struggling at the bottom of the table, having accumulated just 2 points from 15 matches. They have yet to secure a win this season, with a goal difference of -25, scorin

Market 3:
Title: Liverpool FC vs. Brighton & Hove Albion FC: O/U 2.5
Current Market Price: 63.0% (this is the market's implied probability)
Recent trade: $999.81 on Over
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/epl-liv-bri-2025-12-13-more-markets

📰 WEB SEARCH CONTEXT:
Liverpool FC is set to face Brighton & Hove Albion FC on December 13, 2025, at Anfield. The Over/Under (O/U) for total goals in this Premier League match is set at 2.5.

**Recent Team News and Context:**

- **Liverpool FC:** Manager Arne Slot is scheduled to meet with Mohamed Salah to address tensions following the forward's public criticism of the club after a 3-3 draw with Leeds United. Salah's involvement in the upcoming match against Brighton is pending this discussion. Additionally, forward Alexander Isak is a doubt for Saturday after sustaining a knock, with his availability pending evaluation. Liverpool, currently 10th in the Premier League, aim to maintain their four-game unbeaten run amidst internal turmoil and speculation surrounding Salah's future. ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/liverpool-boss-slot-meet-salah-amid-tension-2025-12-12/?utm_source=openai))

- **Brighton & Hove Albion FC:** Brighton drew 1-1 at home with West Ham United in their last match 

---


Provide predictions in the exact format specified.
system_prompt:
You are a prediction market expert analyzing Polymarket markets.
You have been provided with RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT for each market from web search.

IMPORTANT: For each market, you MUST estimate the TRUE PROBABILITY of the outcome.
Compare your probability estimate to the market price to find EDGE (mispricing).

Edge = Your Probability - Market Probability
- Positive edge on YES side means market undervalues YES
- Negative edge means market overvalues YES (bet NO instead)

For each market, provide your prediction in this EXACT format:

MARKET [number]: [decision]
Your Probability: [0-100]%
Market Price: [shown price]%
Edge: [+/-X]% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: [calculate: Edge × potential payout]
Reasoning: [1-2 sentences explaining your probability estimate]

Decision must be one of: YES, NO, or NO_TRADE
- YES = Your probability > Market price + 10% (minimum 10% edge)
- NO = Your probability < Market price - 10%
- NO_TRADE = Edge < 10% (not enough value)

Be contrarian when you have conviction. Look for markets where news hasn't been priced in yet.
consensus_summary: The consensus identifies no trade for Market 1 due to its overpriced probability, while Market 2 shows strong agreement for a "YES" trade on the Over, with multiple AIs calculating a significant edge above 10%. There is notable disagreement on Market 3, with models split between "NO_TRADE" and a "NO" recommendation, reflecting uncertainty from the contextual news.

MARKET 2: NO_TRADE

MARKET 3: NO_TRADE
Your Probability: 60%
Market Price: 63.0%
Edge: -3.0% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: -3.0% × potential payout (not enough value to trade)
Reasoning: Liverpool FC's internal turmoil and potential absence of key players like Mohamed Salah and Alexander Isak may affect their scoring ability, but the market price is already close to the estimated probability, leaving little room for a profitable trade.

MARKET 3: NO

Reasoning: Liverpool's internal turmoil, key player doubts, and Brighton's tendency for lower-scoring draws (e.g., 1-1 last match) reduce the probability of a high-scoring game.
